verses.text: Mamin Jehová, anhej t'ayach tzin col in b'a. Malajocab' b'ak'uinh tzin a cha somchajeli. Colinel yuj a tojolal.
Ak'cot tz'eyan a chiquin t'ayin, tzin a colan t'a elanhchamel. Ochanh in nhaq'ueenoc b'aj ol in col in b'a.
Yujto in nhaq'ueen ach, in cuartel ach, yuj chi' ochanh venhuloc. Ik' in b'eyoc yic manh ol ach alchaj chukal.
Colin t'a jun yaal ix em t'a vichanh, yujto in Columal ach.
Mamin Jehová, ach in Diosal, svak'canoch in b'ha t'a yol a k'ab'. Ha ach tzin a colcaneli, to tz'elk'och syal a lolonel.
Tzin chaquel eb' anima syaq'uem sb'ha t'a juntzanh comon dios malaj yelk'ochi. Ha inxo Mamin Jehová, tzach vak'och yipoc in k'ool.
Tzin tzalaj val yuj a wach'k'olal. Ha ach ix iq'uel in cusk'olal, ojtac pax in yaelal.
Maj in ak'canoch t'a yol sk'ab' eb' vajk'ool. Te levan b'aj ix in kan uuj.
Mamin Jehová, ok'ocab' val a k'ool t'ayin, yujto ay in och t'a ilk'olal. Ix te chacb'i in sat voq'ui, manhxalaj yip in pixan yet' in nivanil.
Ha in q'uinal slajviem t'a skal in yaelal. Ha vab'ilal slajviel yuj in k'acvi. Ha cusk'olal tz'ik'anel vip, k'ununi yel yip in nivanil tik svab'i.
Tzetzab'il in yuj eb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayin, b'uchb'il in yuj eb' cajan t'a in lak'anil. Yajb'il in canel yuj eb' ojtannac in. Ha eb' tzin ilan t'a yoltac b'e, tz'el eb' t'ayin.
Junelnhej ix in b'atcan satk'olal yuj eb'. Icha val to manhxo in animaoc svab'i, icha val junok lum xalu pojnac, icha chi' vaji.
Svab' sajson eb' vetchonhab' t'a in patic. Yalxonhej b'ajtiil, ay xivk'olal sja t'ayin. Junlajanxonhej snaan eb' t'a in patic. Nanon yek' sk'ool eb' tas syutej in yak'anchamoc.
Ha inxo jun Mamin Jehová, a achnhej ayachoch yipoc in k'ool. Toxonton svala': Ha ach val tik, in Diosal ach, xin chi.
Yol val a k'ab' ay in q'uinal. Colinel t'a eb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayin, aton eb' tzak'anoch vuuj.
Il in val och a in a checab' in tik yuj swach'il a k'ool, tzin a colanel yuj a wach'k'olal.
Mamin, van valan in b'a t'ayach. Manh in ak'b'at t'a nivac q'uixvelal. Ha eb' chuk tzak'canb'at t'a nivac q'uixvelal chi', tzak'ancanb'at eb' b'aj tzinan, b'aj ay eb' chamnac.
Ha eb' snaanq'ue lolonel, numk'ajocab' eb', yujto syal lolonel eb' ya t'a eb' anima wach'. Spatiquejel eb' wach' spensar eb', sb'uchvaj eb' t'a eb' wach' chi'.
Yel ton val niwan a wach'k'olal tzak' t'a eb' tzach ik'anchaanh. D'a yichanh eb' anima tzak' a wach'ilal t'a eb' tzach ak'anoch yipoc sk'ool.
Ha t'a a tz'ey tza k'ub'ejel eb' t'a chukal sna eb' puch vinac. Ha b'aj ay ach tza colel eb' t'a schucal lolonel eb' ajk'olal yajoch t'a eb'.
Alchajocab' wach' lolonel t'ayach Mamin Jehová, yujto satub'tac tas ix a b'o t'ayin yuj a wach'k'olal, ayic oyanoch eb' ajk'ool t'a in patic vichanh.
Ha val yic manhxo animaoc in k'ool, ix in na' to ix in ik'canel t'a ichanh, haxo val yic ix in k'anan a colval, ix ab' in tevi.
Xajanejec Jehová, masanil ex yiquexxo yujto ha' stanhvan eb' sk'anab'ajani, palta tz'acan syutej yak'an yaelal t'a yib'anh eb' syik'chaanh sb'a.
Tek'b'ejec e b'a mach ex tzeyak'och Jehová yipoc e k'ool.
